newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan Feed group to tender for 56,000T U.S. corn.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan Feed group to tender for 56,000T U.S. corn.

text.p: Taiwan's Members Feed Industry Group will tender on Friday for a 56,000-tonne shipment of U.S. No.2 corn, traders said on Wednesday.
Local traders said they believed the feed group's long-awaited decision to re-enter the grain market was not related to the recent military tensions in Iraq.
One trader noted that group had passed on the same shipment on August 7 due to high prices and now had decided to retender simply to ensure timely delivery of needed corn supplies.
"The feed group's shipment date is getting close and they have to make a purchase now or change the dates," he said.
Details for the tender are as follow:
